title: Side Effects of Being a Congresswoman (with Rep. Cori Bush)
description:
This week we politic with Congresswoman Cori Bush of Missouri, and get a down-to-earth perspective of the ivory tower.
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
Make your first good decision of the new year, and join over 10 million people using Chime. Sign up takes only two minutes and doesn’t affect your credit score. Get started at chime.com/doses.
